translation: He who, with supreme devotion to Me, teaches this supreme secret to My devotees, shall undoubtedly come to Me.
commentary: 18.68 Who who? Imm this? Param supreme? Guhyam secret? in My devotees in My devotees? Abhidhasyati shall declare? bhaktim devotion? Mayi in Me? The supreme supreme? doing having done? Me to Me? Eve even? eshyati shall come? Undoubtedly doubtless.Commentary This supreme secret The teachings of the Gita as taught above in the form of a dialogue between Lord Krishna and Arjuna. Why is it called a supreme secret Because
